changeBackground

  • changeBackground(__namedParameters: { color?: string; image?: string; scene: Scene }): void
    • Defined in src/lib/commands/changeBackground.ts:11

    Change the background by using either a color (given by a string) or an image URL

    example
    kepler.changeBackground( {scene, color: '#7777777'} )

    Parameters

    • __namedParameters: { color?: string; image?: string; scene: Scene }
      • Optional color?: string
      • Optional image?: string
      • scene: Scene

    Returns void
